availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: D. M. Christian (Todd Co, Ky, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, farmer and provisional government convention member. Virginia native. Married to L. E. Christian. Owned nineteen enslaved persons in Todd County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Todd County in 1860. Owned thirty-four enslaved persons in Todd County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District 1.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 757.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 363A.
KYR-0004-033-0001.
